dct_description_sm: by Mons. d'Anville in June MDCCLXVII.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.

12 bar scales on map given in "Toises", "Hebrew cubits", "Jewish stades", "Roman miles", "Grecian stades", "Modern Grecian miles", "Great Arabian miles", "French leagues", "Jewish measures", "Miles, which are equal to the Sabbatical journey", "Risin, or stades", "Parsaut, or parasangs".
Shows topography, drainage, settlements, boundaries, places of historical interest.
3 inset maps: The tribes -- Jerusalem -- Places laid down by distances given on a scale reduced to a third.
